              Bertil Gustav
            
            
              
                
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            About
            This website shares Bertil’s reflections on articles,
            courses, seminars, and conferences in the following fields:
            epidemiology, applied statistics, causal inference,
            real-world evidence, health economics, cardiovascular
            diseases, dementia, gerontology, public health, and
            others.
            Additionally, this website shares Bertil’s reflections on
            various books and films.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Bertil Gustav
